issue.title: [CF 596] Icon coloring?
issue.body:
I'm probably missing something here, but I can't seem to get icon colors working correctly.
I'm trying to make any buff/debuff icons glow red when the buff/debuff is missing, but have the icon's normal color otherwise.
An example of one such icon is my Savage Roar tracker, which shows if the buff is missing, or if the buff has less than 10 seconds left.
From what I can tell, the icon is always using the "Finished, Always Shown" color, regardless of if the icon is counting down or not.
Here is an export of the icon;

``` ^1^T^SShowTimer^B ^SDurationMin^N3 ^SType^Sbuff ^SConditions^T ^N1^T ^SType^SLUA ^SName^SGetSpecialization()~`==~`2 ^t^Sn^N1 ^t^SName^SSavage~`Roar ^SSettingsPerView^T ^Sicon^T ^STextLayout^S,ArvMJY*R:1m ^t^t^SShowWhen^N3 ^SEnabled^B ^SEvents^T ^N1^T ^SPassingCndt^B ^SType^SSound ^SCndtJustPassed^B ^SValue^N2.99 ^SOnlyShown^B ^SSound^SInterface\AddOns\TellMeWhen\Sounds\Arp31-C2.mp3 ^SEvent^SOnDuration ^SOperator^S<= ^t^N2^T ^SPassingCndt^B ^SType^SSound ^SCndtJustPassed^B ^SValue^N2 ^SOnlyShown^B ^SSound^SInterface\AddOns\TellMeWhen\Sounds\Arp31-C2.mp3 ^SEvent^SOnDuration ^SOperator^S<= ^t^N3^T ^SPassingCndt^B ^SType^SSound ^SCndtJustPassed^B ^SValue^N1 ^SOnlyShown^B ^SSound^SInterface\AddOns\TellMeWhen\Sounds\Arp31-C2.mp3 ^SEvent^SOnDuration ^SOperator^S<= ^t^Sn^N3 ^t^SDurationMax^N10 ^SShowTimerText^B ^t^N60316^S~`~| ^Sicon^^ ```



> Posted by CurseForge user Halsey1006 | Imported from CurseForge issue #596 | Raw

comments.body:
You appear to be using TellMeWhen r581. There is an issue with coloring that was fixed in r582. Please update TMW and check to see if that resolves the problem.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
